mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (reservation_id, accountcust_id, bicycleinfo_id, r_totalprice) SELECT #{reservationId}, #{accountcustId}, #{bicycleinfoId}, d_price FROM depositi INNER JOIN bicycleinfo ON depositi.deposit_id = bicycleinfo.deposit_id AND bicycleinfo.bicycleinfo_id = #{bicycleinfoId}
mapper.select: SELECT bicycleinfo.bicycleinfo_id, bicycleinfo.b_brand, bicycleinfo.b_name, bicycleinfo.b_stock, bicycleinfo.b_imgurl, bicycleinfo.b_name, bicycleinfo.b_stock, reservation.reservation_id, reservation.r_number, reservation.r_totalprice, store.s_address FROM reservation, bicycleinfo, store WHERE reservation.accountcust_id = #{accountcustId} AND reservation.r_status = 0 AND bicycleinfo.bicycleinfo_id = reservation.bicycleinfo_id AND store.store_id = bicycleinfo.store_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leaseinfo(leaseinfo_id, bicycleinfo_id, accountcust_id, orderdeposit_id, l_datefrist, l_number) SELECT #{s1}, bicycleinfo_id, accountcust_id, #{s2}, #{s3}, r_number FROM reservation WHERE reservation_id = #{s1}
mapper.update: UPDATE bicycleinfo INNER JOIN reservation ON bicycleinfo.bicycleinfo_id = reservation.bicycleinfo_id AND reservation.reservation_id IN(#{item}) SET bicycleinfo.b_stock = bicycleinfo.b_stock - reservation.r_number
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, r.accountcust_id, r.r_number, r.r_totalprice, r.r_status, r.r_resdate, c.c_name, b.b_brand, b.b_name, s.s_address FROM reservation r LEFT OUTER JOIN customer c ON c.accountcust_id = r.accountcust_id LEFT OUTER JOIN bicycleinfo b ON b.bicycleinfo_id = r.bicycleinfo_id LEFT OUTER JOIN store s ON s.store_id = b.store_id;
